synopsis.text:
Novice summoner Linaly and her impetuous companion, Prettz, embark on a perilous journey to safeguard the Wind Crystal, the last remaining elemental crystal on Planet R. Two centuries have passed since the legendary hero Bartz, Linaly's ancestor, and his companions thwarted the menacing Exdeath. Now, the malevolent Ra Devil schemes to seize the Wind Crystal to awaken the destructive deity, Deathgyunos, and plunge the world into chaos.

As the descendants of ancient protectors, Linaly and Prettz must navigate treacherous obstacles and fend off relentless pursuers, including the Tycoon military and air pirates led by the enigmatic Rouge. With the fate of their world hanging in the balance, can they uncover the source of the looming threat and prevent the crystals from falling into the wrong hands? Join Linaly and Prettz in their thrilling quest to protect the harmony of Planet R and uphold their ancestors' legacy.
